alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 11:56PM EST until February 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain is expected. Light snow may mix in at times. A light glaze of ice accumulation is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
